chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
R: relation T
ord: order R
chain_sup: forall S : Ensemble T, chain S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}
inflation: forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}

Goal:
chain tower

Premises:
Ensemble = fun U : Type => U -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Ensemble _%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
chain = fun S : Ensemble T => forall x y : T, In S x -> In S y -> R x y \/ R y x : Ensemble T -> Prop
order : relation ?A -> Prop where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type]
In : Ensemble ?U -> ?U -> Prop where ?U : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type]
relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments relation _%type_scope
eq_exist_uncurried : {p : ?u1 = ?v1 | eq_rect ?u1 ?P ?u2 ?v1 p = ?v2} -> exist ?P ?u1 ?u2 = exist ?P ?v1 ?v2 where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- ?P ?v1]
sig_of_sig2_eq : ?u = ?v -> sig_of_sig2 ?u = sig_of_sig2 ?v where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}]
proj1_sig_eq : ?u = ?v -> proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
ssrfun.s2val : {x : ?T | ?P x & ?Q x} -> ?T where ?T : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type] ?P : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> Prop]
ssrfun.s2valP' : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x & ?Q x}, ?Q (ssrfun.s2val u) where ?T : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type] ?P : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> Prop]
ssrfun.s2valP : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x & ?Q x}, ?P (ssrfun.s2val u) where ?T : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type] ?P : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> Prop]
proj2_sig_eq : forall p : ?u = ?v, eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) (proj1_sig_eq p) = proj2_sig ?v where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
ord_trans : order ?R -> transitive ?R where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- relation ?A]
ord_refl : order ?R -> reflexive ?R where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- relation ?A]
ord_antisym : order ?R -> antisymmetric ?R where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- relation ?A]
inverse_image : (?X -> ?Y) -> Ensemble ?Y -> Ensemble ?X where ?X : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type]
injective : (?U -> ?V) -> Prop where ?U : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type]
equiv_refl : equivalence ?R -> reflexive ?R where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- relation ?A]
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Prop]
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type]
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Prop]
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type]
inhabited_sig_to_exists : inhabited {x : ?A | ?P x} -> exists x : ?A, ?P x where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type] ?P : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> Prop]
ssrfun.svalP : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x}, ?P (proj1_sig u) where ?T : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type] ?P : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> Prop]
exists_to_inhabited_sig : (exists x : ?A, ?P x) -> inhabited {x : ?A | ?P x} where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type] ?P : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> Prop]
eq_sig2_hprop : (forall (x : ?A) (p q : ?Q x), p = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}, sig_of_sig2 u = sig_of_sig2 v -> u = v where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type] ?P : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> Prop]
In_Image_elim : forall (A : Ensemble ?U) (f : ?U -> ?V), injective f -> forall x : ?U, In (Im A f) (f x) -> In A x where ?U : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type]
eq_sig2_hprop_iff : (forall (x : ?A) (p q : ?Q x), p = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}, u = v < -> sig_of_sig2 u = sig_of_sig2 v where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type] ?P : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> Prop]
Im_def : forall (X : Ensemble ?U) (f : ?U -> ?V) (x : ?U), In X x -> In (Im X f) (f x) where ?U : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type]
ssrfun.Tagged : forall T_ : ?I -> Type, T_ ?i -> {x0 : ?I & T_ x0} where ?I : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- ?I]
eq_sig_rec : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Set, (forall (p : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p q)) ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_rect : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Type, (forall (p : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p q)) ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_ind : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Prop, (forall (p : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p q)) ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
Im_inv : forall (X : Ensemble ?U) (f : ?U -> ?V) (y : ?V), In (Im X f) y -> exists x : ?U, In X x /\ f x = y where ?U : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type]
FunctionalExtensionality.functional_extensionality_dep_good : forall f g : forall x : ?A, ?B x, (forall x : ?A, f x = g x) -> f = g where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)} |- Type] ?B : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S ->...-> Type]
